Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.enemies

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
game.model.entities.Entity
game.model.entities.MovingEntity
game.model.enemies.Enemy
game.model.enemies.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChangeDirection, Vulnerable
public class Boss extends Enemy implements Vulnerable, ChangeDirection
The Boss class represents a powerful enemy in the game with multiple lives and the ability to change directions randomly. It implements both Vulnerable and ChangeDirection interfaces to handle interactions with the player and movement behavior.

      Returns:

    • getLives

      public int getLives()
      Gets the remaining lives of the Boss.

    • changeDirection

      public void changeDirection()
      Randomly changes the direction of the Boss based on current movement state. The Boss may switch between moving left, right, up, or down.
      Specified by:
      changeDirection in interface ChangeDirection

    • randomizeDirection

      private void randomizeDirection()
      Randomizes the movement direction of the Boss, choosing between up, down, left, and right.

    • updateXPos

      public void updateXPos()
      Updates the x-coordinate of the Boss based on the current xSpeed and checks for collisions with tiles.
      Overrides:
      updateXPos in class MovingEntity

    • updateYPos

      public void updateYPos()
      Updates the y-coordinate of the Boss based on the current airSpeed and checks for collisions. If the Boss moves off the top or bottom of the level, its position is wrapped around.
      Overrides:
      updateYPos in class MovingEntity

    • removeEnemy

      public void removeEnemy()
      Removes the Boss from the game. Upon removal, the Boss drops two fruits if it is grounded.
      Overrides:
      removeEnemy in class Enemy

    • updateEntity

      public void updateEntity()
      Updates the Boss's state, including its movement, life count, and whether it is dead or alive. When the Boss dies, it drops fruits and removes itself from the level.
      Overrides:
      updateEntity in class MovingEntity

    • looseLife

      public void looseLife()
      Reduces the Boss's life count by one if it is not currently invulnerable, and triggers invulnerability for a short duration.
      Specified by:
      looseLife in interface Vulnerable
